column4: Im looking to do a PXE netboot, I need a Kernel img, was trying Ubuntu neetboot but that is trying to install a system instead of just running  OS, any ideas

hmm
i usually just build a kernel

yea, i'd just build a kernel w/ nfsroot and dhcp

works great, i've got thin clients that boot over wireless that way
